content: As you pass under the bridge, watch for a Puppet Spider to drop from above, and be sure to look along the left wall to notice its actually a row of hanging cocoons.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Bonevault'.
The content is as follows:
As you pass under the bridge, watch for a Puppet Spider to drop from above, and be sure to look along the left wall to notice its actually a row of hanging cocoons.
